name: Daily Review
description: Reflect and review your day.A collection of digital and printable reflection journals to help you reflect day by day in Notion.How does it work?Learn about your overall daily performance with the printable "Daily Review" template. Includes a mood tracker and 6 reflection questions.Combine the printable planners with the printable reflection journal to routinely plan, track, review, and reflect on your entire year.What's included?Daily questionsMood trackerNext day planWho will benefit from this?
features: Daily questions; Mood tracker; Next day plan; Individuals; Professionals; Anyone who would like to review and reflect on their performance; Absolutely. Just duplicate the template from the link after your purchase.; No worries! Contact me in my DMs:Twitter
